Olympic Games (2020)

lead_paragraph: If the International Olympic Committee approves, as expected, the five sports Japan proposed adding for 2020, it will be a victory for a youth movement.
snippet: If the International Olympic Committee approves, as expected, the five sports Japan proposed adding for 2020, it will be a victory for a youth movement.
